title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 97.8 - Subpoenas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 97.8 - Subpoenas

State Regulations
(a) Subpoenas may be issued
by the hearing officer, the Attorney General or any attorney for a party who is a member of the New York Bar. (b) Subpoenas shall be served in accordance with the Civil Practice Law and Rules. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
97.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
